TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CassandraKeyspaceResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a CassandraKeyspace along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetCassandraKeyspaceResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetCassandraKeyspace method.
